title: Burger Edge
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, American, Western, Fast food, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Burger chain with 3 vegetarian and 1 vegan burger on the menu. The lentil & vegetable patty is vegan and is browned on a separate grill plate that sits on top of the char grill. The white rolls and tortilla wraps are vegan (wholemeal bun contains butter). The relish, tomato sauce, bbq sauce, hot chilli sauce, sea salt, Tuscan seasoning, Mexican seasoning are vegan. Chips and onion rings are cooked in same oil as potato rosti (contains egg).
streetAddress: Whitford Plaza Shopping Centre, Marmion Ave
